channel.title: site on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in site on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-01-24
item.description: Leak reveals Microsoft’s canceled Windows OS for dual-screen devices (2 minute read) Microsoft was working on a secret pocketable Surface device powered by a custom Windows OS before turning to Android for its Surface Duo.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-06
item.description: Samsung’s Galaxy Watch 3 software detailed in new leak (2 minute read) Samsung’s Galaxy Watch 3 will likely feature customizable watch faces and updates to its music, email, and calendar apps.
